head.title: Remove pages from {{FileFormatUp}} in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Easily delete specific pages from {{FileFormatUp}} files using {{ProdFullName}}. Process PDFs, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, archives, and more.

header.title: Remove pages from {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} brings powerful page removal capabilities to your {{EnvNameShort}} applications, making document management easier.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What is {{ProdShortName}}?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful document processing tool that supports over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. It lets you merge, split, extract, move, swap, and delete pages, improving how you handle documents in your applications.

more_features.title: Advanced document handling
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} simplifies working with documents by providing a full set of tools for over 50 popular file formats.

feature_1.title: Merge different file types
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word files, presentations, spreadsheets, images, and archives with precise merging options.

feature_2.title: Manage pages easily
feature_2.content: Move, swap, or remove pages to organize your documents exactly as needed.

feature_3.title: Adjust page orientation
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch between portrait and landscape mode.

feature_4.title: Extract pages as new files
feature_4.content: Select specific pages and save them separately as new documents.

formats.title: Remove pages from various document types
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports more than 50 file formats, making document modifications quick and seamless.

operations.title: Main features
operations.description: Explore additional tools available in our document processing solution.

examples.comment_1: Initialize a {{NameProduct}} instance with the file path

content.step_2: Select the pages you want to delete.
